attributes.action: Hold a Public Enquiry into the suitability of a National Grid system for the distribution Water in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The debacle of the loss of The Mythe Water Treatment works in Gloucestershire on Sunday 22nd July 2007 caused the loss of supply to 140,000 homes, immediately affecting over 340,000 people. A national grid for the distribution of water, could allow water from other resources or area to supplement the loss of water supply to Gloucester, Cheltenham and Tewkesbury.
